Reliable Repair Services for Your Home Appliances

At Guwahati Electro Care, we specialize in high-quality repair services for all your home appliances. We are not associated with any brand or a certified/brand-authorized service center, but we are a team of professional technicians providing third-party repair for any home appliances in Guwahati City. Our expert technicians are dedicated to restoring your appliances quickly and efficiently, ensuring your home runs smoothly.

Repair

Effortless Appliance Repair Made Simple

Getting your appliances repaired is easy with Guwahati Electro Care. Follow our simple steps to ensure a smooth and hassle-free experience.

Step 1: Contact Us for Assistance

Reach out to us via phone or online to describe your appliance issue and schedule a service appointment at your convenience.

Step 2: Technician Visit to Your Location

Our experienced technicians will visit your location, thoroughly inspect the appliance, and diagnose the problem with accuracy.

Step 3: Detailed Diagnosis and Repair Estimate

We provide a clear and detailed estimate of the repair costs, including parts and labor, with no hidden fees.

Your Trusted Partner for Appliance Repairs

FAQs

Find answers to your questions about our repair services, pricing, and scheduling appointments.

How do I schedule?

Reach out to us via phone or online to describe your appliance issue. You can schedule a service appointment at your convenience. Our team will work with you to find a suitable time.

What is the cost?

We provide a clear and detailed estimate of the repair costs before any work begins. This includes parts and labor, ensuring there are no hidden fees. You can trust us for transparent pricing.

How long will it take?

The time required for repairs varies based on the appliance and the issue. Our technicians will assess the problem and provide an estimated timeline during their visit. We strive to complete repairs as quickly as possible.

Do you offer warranties?

Yes, we offer warranties on our repair services and parts. This ensures your peace of mind and confidence in our work. Details about the warranty will be provided during the service.

What appliances do you repair?

We specialize in repairing a wide range of home appliances, including ACs, TVs, washing machines, refrigerators, and microwaves. Our experienced technicians are equipped to handle various brands and models. You can rely on us for expert service.

Still have questions?

We’re here to help you!
